doc: Tom Hanks https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tom_Hanks 1 Thomas Jeffrey Hanks (born July 9, 1956) is an American actor and filmmaker. Hanks is known for his comedic and dramatic roles in such films as Splash (1984), Big (1988), Turner Hooch (1989), A League of Their Own (1992), Sleepless in Seattle (1993), Apollo 13 (1995), You've Got Mail (1998), The Green Mile (1999), Cast Away (2000), Road to Perdition (2002), Cloud Atlas (2012), Captain Phillips (2013), Saving Mr. Banks (2013), and Sully (2016). He has also starred in the Robert Langdon film series, and voices Sheriff Woody in the Toy Story film series. Hanks has collaborated with film director Steven Spielberg on five films to date: Saving Private Ryan (1998), Catch Me If You Can (2002), The Terminal (2004), Bridge of Spies (2015), and The Post (2017), as well as the 2001 miniseries Band of Brothers, which launched Hanks as a successful director, producer, and screenwriter. In 2010, Spielberg and Hanks were executive producers on the HBO miniseries The Pacific. Hanks' films have grossed more than $4.5 billion at U.S. and Canadian box offices and more than $9.0 billion worldwide, making him the fourth highest-grossing actor in North America. Hanks has been nominated for numerous awards during his career. He won a Golden Globe Award and an Academy Award for Best Actor for his role in Philadelphia (1993), as well as a Golden Globe, an Academy Award, a Screen Actors Guild Award, and a People's Choice Award for Best Actor for Forrest Gump (1994). In 1995, Hanks became one of only two actors who won the Academy Award for Best Actor in consecutive years, with Spencer Tracy being the other. This feat has not been accomplished since. In 2004, he received the Stanley Kubrick Britannia Award for Excellence in Film from the British Academy of Film and Television Arts (BAFTA). In 2014, he received a Kennedy Center Honor, and in 2016, he received a Presidential Medal of Freedom from President Barack Obama, as well as the French Legion of Honor. Thomas_Jeffrey_Hanks ( born July_9_,_1956 ) is an_American_actor_and_filmmaker . Hanks is_known for his_comedic_and_dramatic_roles in such_films as Splash_(_1984_)_,_Big_(_1988_)_,_Turner_(_1989_) , A_League of Their_Own_(_1992_) , Sleepless in Seattle_(_1993_) , Apollo_13_(_1995_) , You 've_Got Mail_(_1998_) , The_Green_Mile ( 1999_) , Cast Away (_2000_) , Road to Perdition_(_2002_) , Cloud_Atlas_(_2012_) , Captain_Phillips_(_2013_) , Saving Mr._Banks ( 2013_) , and Sully_(_2016_) . He has_also_starred in the_Robert_Langdon_film_series , and voices_Sheriff_Woody in the_Toy_Story_film_series . In 2010 , Spielberg_and_Hanks were executive_producers on the_HBO_miniseries The_Pacific . Hanks '_films have_grossed more_than_$_4.5_billion at U.S._and_Canadian_box_offices and more_than_$_9.0_billion_worldwide , making him the_fourth_highest-grossing_actor in North_America . 'I', 'I'] {PERSON[Thomas_Jeffrey_Hanks]} ( born July 9 , 1956 ) is an American actor and filmmaker . {PERSON[Hanks]} is known for his comedic and dramatic roles in such films as Splash ( 1984 ) , Big ( 1988 ) , {ORGANIZATION[Turner_]} ( 1989 ) , A League of Their Own ( 1992 ) , Sleepless in {LOCATION[Seattle]} ( 1993 ) , Apollo 13 ( 1995 ) , You 've Got Mail ( 1998 ) , The Green Mile ( 1999 ) , Cast Away ( 2000 ) , Road to Perdition ( 2002 ) , Cloud Atlas ( 2012 ) , Captain {PERSON[Phillips]} ( 2013 ) , Saving Mr. {PERSON[Banks]} ( 2013 ) , and Sully ( 2016 ) . He has also starred in the {PERSON[Robert_Langdon]} film series , and voices Sheriff {PERSON[Woody]} in the Toy Story film series . {PERSON[Hanks]} has collaborated with film director {PERSON[Steven_Spielberg]} on five films to date : Saving Private {PERSON[Ryan]} ( 1998 ) , Catch Me If You Can ( 2002 ) , The Terminal ( 2004 ) , Bridge of Spies ( 2015 ) , and The {ORGANIZATION[Post]} ( 2017 ) , as well as the 2001 miniseries Band of {ORGANIZATION[Brothers]} , which launched {PERSON[Hanks]} as a successful director , producer , and screenwriter . In 2010 , {PERSON[Spielberg]} and {PERSON[Hanks]} were executive producers on the {ORGANIZATION[HBO]} miniseries The {LOCATION[Pacific]} . {PERSON[Hanks]} ' films have grossed more than $ 4.5 billion at {LOCATION[U.S.]} and Canadian box offices and more than $ 9.0 billion worldwide , making him the fourth highest-grossing actor in {LOCATION[North_America]} . {PERSON[Hanks]} has been nominated for numerous awards during his career . He won a Golden Globe Award and an Academy Award for Best Actor for his role in {LOCATION[Philadelphia]} ( 1993 ) , as well as a {ORGANIZATION[Golden_Globe]} , an Academy Award , a Screen Actors Guild Award , and a People 's Choice Award for Best Actor for Forrest Gump ( 1994 ) . In 1995 , {PERSON[Hanks]} became one of only two actors who won the Academy Award for Best Actor in consecutive years , with {PERSON[Spencer_Tracy]} being the other . This feat has not been accomplished since . In 2004 , he received the Stanley Kubrick Britannia Award for Excellence in Film from the {ORGANIZATION[British_Academy_of_Film_and_Television_Arts]} ( {ORGANIZATION[BAFTA]} ) . In 2014 , he received a Kennedy Center Honor , and in 2016 , he received a Presidential Medal of Freedom from President {PERSON[Barack_Obama]} , as well as the French Legion of Honor . {PERSON[Thomas_Jeffrey_Hanks]} ( born July 9 , 1956 ) is an {MISC[American]} actor and filmmaker . {PERSON[Hanks]} is known for his comedic and dramatic roles in such films as Splash ( 1984 ) , Big ( 1988 ) , {ORGANIZATION[Turner_]} ( 1989 ) , A League of Their Own ( 1992 ) , {LOCATION[Sleepless]} in {LOCATION[Seattle]} ( 1993 ) , {ORGANIZATION[Apollo]} 13 ( 1995 ) , You 've Got Mail ( 1998 ) , {ORGANIZATION[The_Green_Mile]} ( 1999 ) , Cast Away ( 2000 ) , Road to Perdition ( 2002 ) , {PERSON[Cloud_Atlas]} ( 2012 ) , {PERSON[Captain_Phillips]} ( 2013 ) , Saving {PERSON[Mr._Banks]} ( 2013 ) , and Sully ( 2016 ) . In 2004 , he received the {ORGANIZATION[Stanley_Kubrick_Britannia_Award_for_Excellence]} in Film from the {ORGANIZATION[British_Academy_of_Film_and_Television_Arts]} ( {ORGANIZATION[BAFTA]} ) . In 2014 , he received a {ORGANIZATION[Kennedy_Center_Honor]} , and in 2016 , he received a {ORGANIZATION[Presidential_Medal_of_Freedom]} from President {PERSON[Barack_Obama]} , as well as the {MISC[French]} {ORGANIZATION[Legion_of_Honor]} . {PERSON[Thomas_Jeffrey_Hanks]} ( born {DATE[July_9_,_1956]} ) is an American actor and filmmaker . Hanks is known for his comedic and dramatic roles in such films as Splash ( {DATE[1984]} ) , Big ( {DATE[1988]} ) , {ORGANIZATION[Turner_]} ( {DATE[1989]} ) , A League of Their Own ( {DATE[1992]} ) , Sleepless in {LOCATION[Seattle]} ( {DATE[1993]} ) , Apollo 13 ( {DATE[1995]} ) , You 've Got Mail ( {DATE[1998]} ) , The Green Mile ( {DATE[1999]} ) , Cast Away ( 2000 ) , Road to Perdition ( 2002 ) , Cloud Atlas ( 2012 ) , Captain {PERSON[Phillips]} ( 2013 ) , Saving Mr. Banks ( 2013 ) , and Sully ( 2016 ) . He has also starred in the {PERSON[Robert_Langdon]} film series , and voices {PERSON[Sheriff_Woody]} in the Toy Story film series . Hanks has collaborated with film director {PERSON[Steven_Spielberg]} on five films to date : Saving Private Ryan ( {DATE[1998]} ) , Catch Me If You Can ( 2002 ) , The Terminal ( 2004 ) , Bridge of Spies ( 2015 ) , and The Post ( 2017 ) , as well as the {DATE[2001]} {ORGANIZATION[miniseries_Band_of_Brothers]} , which launched {PERSON[Hanks]} as a successful director , producer , and screenwriter . In {DATE[2010]} , {PERSON[Spielberg]} and {PERSON[Hanks]} were executive producers on the {ORGANIZATION[HBO]} miniseries The {LOCATION[Pacific]} . {PERSON[Hanks]} ' films have grossed more than {MONEY[$_4.5_billion]} at {LOCATION[U.S.]} and Canadian box offices and more than {MONEY[$_9.0_billion]} worldwide , making him the fourth highest-grossing actor in {LOCATION[North_America]} . Hanks has been nominated for numerous awards during his career . He won a {ORGANIZATION[Golden_Globe_Award]} and an {ORGANIZATION[Academy_Award]} for Best Actor for his role in {LOCATION[Philadelphia]} ( {DATE[1993]} ) , as well as a {ORGANIZATION[Golden_Globe]} , an {ORGANIZATION[Academy_Award]} , a {ORGANIZATION[Screen_Actors_Guild_Award]} , and a People 's Choice Award for Best Actor for {ORGANIZATION[Forrest_Gump]} ( {DATE[1994]} ) . In {DATE[1995]} , {PERSON[Hanks]} became one of only two actors who won the {ORGANIZATION[Academy_Award]} for Best Actor in consecutive years , with {PERSON[Spencer_Tracy]} being the other . This feat has not been accomplished since . In {DATE[2014]} , he received a {ORGANIZATION[Kennedy_Center_Honor]} , and in {DATE[2016]} , he received a Presidential Medal of Freedom from President {PERSON[Barack_Obama]} , as well as the French Legion of Honor .
